a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of urban population by source, World, 1950 to 2020
The European Commission combines satellite imagery with national census data to derive urban and rural
populations based on its own standardized definitions. The UN figures are based on nationally-defined urban
Data source: European Commission, Joint Research Centre (JRC) (2023); United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs,
